item.title: Version 1.1.13
item.description: What’s New in Version 1.1.13+40 1. Deal filters now show user names instead of IDs. 2. Fixed alliance name not showing properly on the deal detail page. 3. Corrected some wrong information in the deal detail view. 4. Global map color issues for some countries have been resolved. 5. Crimea is now correctly displayed as part of Ukraine.

item.title: Version 1.1.13
item.description: What’s New in Version 1.1.13+40 1. Deal filters now show user names instead of IDs. 2. Fixed alliance name not showing properly on the deal detail page. 3. Corrected some wrong information in the deal detail view. 4. Global map color issues for some countries have been resolved. 5. Crimea is now correctly displayed as part of Ukraine.
